articles.author: Kaitlin Vogel
articles.title: What is Cardiovascular-Kidney-Metabolic Syndrome? What to Know - Healthline
articles.description: Officials from the American Heart Association say that multiple chronic conditions can be defined as a new syndrome called cardiovascular-kidney-metabolic syndrome or CKM.
articles.content:
• The American Heart Association has released a new advisory regarding a new type of condition related to heart, kidney and metabolic disorders.

articles.author: Micah Hanks, Micah Hanks
articles.title: Confirmation of Oldest Fossil Human Footprints in North America Upends Once Accepted Timeline of Earliest Arrivals - The Debrief
articles.description: New research has confirmed that fossil human footprints at White Sands National Park are between 21,000 and 23,000 years old.
articles.content: New research has confirmed a series of fossil human footprints preserved at White Sands National Park, New Mexico, are between 21,000 and 23,000 years old, reaffirming past studies that extended the … [+6931 chars]
